channel.title: Twin (Neutral Killing)
channel.description:
Twin - Neutral Killing
Passive: Conspiring - You meet with the other twin at night. If he dies you die. Passive: Determined - You are night immune and will keep your goal if you become king
Day ability 1: Steroids - The next use of Brew Tea will make his attack pierce night immunity as well (2 uses) Day ability 2: Herbs - The next use of Brew Tea will heal as well (1 use)
Night ability 1: Brew Tea - Makes the other Twin occupy immune tonight Night ability 2: Assassinate - Kill your target (only 1 twin can use this each night)
Goal: Normal NK goal, you win with the other twin.
Note: if you think this is like the old twins then you are not mistaken. If one twin spawns then the other does too.

item.title: Twin (Neutral Killing)

item.title: Twin (Neutral Killing)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Twin - Neutral Killing

Passive: Conspiring - You meet with the other twin at night. If he dies you die.
Passive: Determined - You are night immune and will keep your goal if you become king

Day ability 1: Steroids - The next use of Brew Tea will make his attack pierce night immunity as well (2 uses)
Day ability 2: Herbs - The next use of Brew Tea will heal as well (1 use)

Night ability 1: Brew Tea - Makes the other Twin occupy immune tonight
Night ability 2: Assassinate - Kill your target (only 1 twin can use this each night)

Goal: Normal NK goal, you win with the other twin.

Note: if you think this is like the old twins then you are not mistaken. If one twin spawns then the other does too.

Read full topic
